issue.introductory_text: The goal of this workshop is to present, discuss and assess the development and use of Open-Source Software (OSS) for scientific visualization. This one-day workshop will bring together developers and users of well-known OSS for visualization and will focus on user\\\'s experience in specific scientific and industrial contexts. Attendees are encouraged to submit a short abstract paper.
issue.name: OSVIS 2014
issue.short_description: Workshop on Open Source in Visualization (OSVIS) as part of EuroVis 2014.
